channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Cracked and raised paving slabs, 25th February
item.description:
Raised paving slabs and badly cracked slabs. They have been here for at least 10 yrs. Elderly residents live in Strickland Rd, I went out with my walker and very nearly fell over. Other residents have sticks, frames etc. So this problem remains dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Strickland Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recurring potholes, 25th February
item.description:
The potholes are located between the 50 MPH signage and two trees to side of road heading to Shurdington. This time last year 23.1.2025 there was the same issue which caused hundreds of pounds of damage to my car and were not patch repaired until March 2025. These potholes are forming again and need to be correctly addressed and not just patched repaired. The damaged road along the entirety of Badgeworth Lane needs to be surveyed and rectified properly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 25th February
item.description:
2 hour Give and take plus 15. Minutes delay boards carriage way pothole 1000x700x120mm (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple deep, wide potholes, 25th February
item.description:
Between Blaisdon Way and Pilgrove Way heading towards Gloucester (Old Gloucester Road). There are multiple dangerous potholes, drivers are having to swerve to avoid damage to their vehicles. This is totalling unacceptable and this stretch of road has been reported for months now and nothing done.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Hayden Road, Hesters Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain cover rattles every time vehicles go over it., 25th February
item.description:
The "Highways" manhole cover is located opposite the end of Brooksdale Lane and on the A46 Shurdington Road, GL53 0JD. It is outside my house, 6 Shurdington Road. It bangs every time a vehical goes over it, which is thousands of times each day.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Brooksdale Lane, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
